select TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm, sum(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT) as paymentTotal from payment where PYNM_DT between to_date('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} AND FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') order BY yyyymm

SELECT TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm , SUM(FRCS_ORDER_ORDER_AMT) as total FROM FRCS_ORDER WHERE FRCS_ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} and frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY yyyymm

SELECT TO_CHAR(DUES_PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm, DUES_ELECTRIC_AMT, DUES_WATER_AMT, DUES_GAS_AMT, DUES_MTRT_AMT , DUES_ELECTRIC_AMT + DUES_WATER_AMT + DUES_GAS_AMT + DUES_MTRT_AMT as publicduesTotal FROM PUBLICDUES WHERE DUES_PAY_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(DUES_PAY_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} and frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DUES_PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM'), DUES_ELECTRIC_AMT, DUES_WATER_AMT, DUES_GAS_AMT, DUES_MTRT_AMT ORDER BY yyyymm
select RY_TOTAL_AMT from( SELECT RY_CLM_YM, RY_TOTAL_AMT FROM royalty where TO_CHAR(RY_PAY_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} and frcs_no = #{frcsNo} order by ry_clm_ym desc) where rownum <=1
select DUES_ELECTRIC_AMT, DUES_WATER_AMT, DUES_GAS_AMT, DUES_MTRT_AMT from PUBLICDUES where TO_CHAR(DUES_PAY_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} and frcs_no = #{frcsNo}

select RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT, RY_ORDER_AMT, RY_NPMNT_AMT, RY_OVRINT_AMT, RY_ROYALTY_AMT from(
SELECT RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT, RY_ORDER_AMT, RY_NPMNT_AMT, RY_OVRINT_AMT, RY_ROYALTY_AMT FROM royalty where TO_CHAR(RY_PAY_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} and frcs_no = #{frcsNo} order by ry_clm_ym desc) where rownum <=1
